short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overlays a chat onto the page, allowing users to pick a name and room code and chat with their friends on a server they provide.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overlays a chat onto the page, allowing users to pick a display name and room code and chat with their friends on a server they provide. Example code for such a server can be found at https://github.com/jonwillbc/chat-overlay-server
